agent_purpose: Voice-based hotel concierge that handles incoming voice calls
description: A voice-based hotel concierge agent that handles inbound calls, assists with room bookings, provides hotel information, and manages guest requests via WebSocket audio streams.

raw_test_response:
Good evening, welcome to our hotel. How may I assist you today?

I'd be happy to help you with a booking or answer any questions you might have about our accommodations. Are you looking to make a reservation or inquire about our hotel's facilities? Please let me know how I can make your stay with us comfortable and memorable.

Our hotel offers a range of room types, from cozy standard rooms to luxurious suites, each designed to provide you with a delightful and relaxing experience. We pride ourselves on exceptional service and amenities to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

What can I help you with today?
